entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text:
@GavinNewsom @longgoneblond We agree! Science and medics should be the authority when deciding #COVID19 response. Why do you continue to ignore experts who are calling for mass release from prison? We ask that you let the experts lead and implement their recommendations. 
https://t.co/aeHvlN6pt8
